windows.changelog:
A new release is here with some new features, bug fixes and improvements.

New features:

  • Introduced a new toolbar to enhance feature discovery in Daino Notes. The toolbar conveniently disappears once you begin typing.
  • Added support for text selection using the keyboard.

Bug fixes and improvements:

  • Enhanced user interface with a streamlined search box, which now appears only after clicking the search icon or by using the Ctrl + F shortcut.
  • Boosted search performance for faster results.
  • Updated the shortcut for moving blocks up or down from Shift + Alt + Up/Down to Alt + Up/Down.
  • Resolved an issue where the editor did not automatically focus after creating a new note.
  • Fixed a bug where changing direction after selecting a word caused the selection to be lost.
  • Addressed various issues with copying and pasting HTML content from websites.
  • Fixed a bug that sometimes caused the app to crash when starting offline.
  • Corrected an issue on Windows and Linux where the 'delete' key was not recognized.
  • Ensuring pop-ups close automatically when switching notes.
  • Plus, many other bug fixes and enhancements.

Join our Discord for discussions, and feel free to email us. We love hearing from our users.

We have a lot more to show, so stay tuned.
